description_short: Neural network model for classifying movie review sentiment as positive or negative
description: This model analyzes movie reviews and predicts whether they express positive or negative sentiment. Built using TensorFlow Hub pre-trained embeddings and trained on the IMDB movie reviews dataset containing 50,000 reviews. The model uses modern NLP techniques with transfer learning for accurate sentiment classification.

inputs.name: review_text
inputs.label: Movie Review Text
inputs.description: Raw text of a movie review in English. Can be any length - the model will handle preprocessing automatically.
inputs.example: This movie was absolutely fantastic! The acting was superb and the plot kept me engaged throughout.

outputs.name: confidence
outputs.label: Prediction Confidence
outputs.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1, where higher values indicate more confident predictions

outputs.name: raw_score
outputs.label: Raw Model Output
outputs.description: Raw sigmoid output where values > 0.5 indicate positive sentiment, < 0.5 indicate negative sentiment
